00022         template < class Tp_, class Distance_ > struct r_a_iterator
00023         {
00024                 typedef std::random_access_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00025                 typedef Tp_ value_type;
00026                 typedef Distance_ difference_type;
00027                 typedef Tp_ *pointer;
00028                 typedef Tp_ & reference;
00029         };
00030 
00031 #define STXXL_ADAPTOR_ARITHMETICS(pos) \
00032         bool operator == (const _Self & a) const \
00033         { \
00034                 return (a.pos == pos); \
00035         }; \
00036         bool operator != (const _Self & a) const \
00037         { \
00038                 return (a.pos != pos); \
00039         }; \
00040         bool operator < (const _Self & a) const \
00041         { \
00042                 return (pos < a.pos); \
00043         }; \
00044   bool operator > (const _Self & a) const \
00045         { \
00046                 return (pos > a.pos); \
00047         }; \
00048   bool operator <= (const _Self & a) const \
00049         { \
00050                 return (pos <= a.pos); \
00051         }; \
00052   bool operator >= (const _Self & a) const \
00053         { \
00054                 return (pos >= a.pos); \
00055         }; \
00056         _Self operator + (pos_type off) const \
00057         { \
00058                 return _Self (array, pos + off); \
00059         } \
00060         _Self operator - (pos_type off) const \
00061         { \
00062                 return _Self (array, pos - off); \
00063         } \
00064         _Self & operator ++ () \
00065         { \
00066                 pos++; \
00067                 return *this; \
00068         } \
00069         _Self operator ++ (int)  \
00070         { \
00071                 _Self tmp = *this; \
00072                 pos++; \
00073                 return tmp; \
00074         } \
00075         _Self & operator -- () \
00076         { \
00077                 pos--; \
00078                 return *this; \
00079         } \
00080         _Self operator -- (int) \
00081         { \
00082                 _Self tmp = *this; \
00083                 pos--; \
00084                 return tmp; \
00085         } \
00086   pos_type operator - (const _Self & a) const \
00087   { \
00088     return pos - a.pos; \
00089   } \
00090   _Self & operator -= (pos_type off) \
00091   { \
00092     pos -=off; \
00093     return *this; \
00094   } \
00095   _Self & operator += (pos_type off) \
00096   { \
00097     pos +=off; \
00098     return *this; \
00099   }

00101         template < class one_dim_array_type, class data_type,
00102                 class pos_type >
00103                 struct TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase:public r_a_iterator <
00104                 data_type, pos_type >
00105         {
00106                 one_dim_array_type *array;
00107                 pos_type pos;
00108                 typedef pos_type _pos_type;
00109                 typedef TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase < one_dim_array_type,
00110                         data_type, pos_type > _Self;
00111 
00112                 TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase ()
00113                 {
00114                 };
00115 
00116           TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase (one_dim_array_type * a, pos_type p):array (a),
00117                         pos(p)
00118                 {
00119                 };
00120                 TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase (const TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase & a):array (a.array),
00121                         pos (a.pos)
00122                 {
00123                 };
00124 
00125     STXXL_ADAPTOR_ARITHMETICS(pos)
00126   };

00131 #define BLOCK_ADAPTOR_OPERATORS(two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base)              \
00132                                                                                 \
00133 template <unsigned _blk_sz,typename _run_type,class __pos_type>                                 \
00134 inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & operator ++ (  \
00135       two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & a)              \
00136 {                                                                               \
00137   a.pos++;                                                                      \
00138   return a;                                                                     \
00139 }                                                                               \
00140                                                                                 \
00141 template <unsigned _blk_sz,typename _run_type,class __pos_type>                                 \
00142 inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> operator ++ (    \
00143       two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & a, int)         \
00144 {                                                                               \
00145   two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> tmp = a;              \
00146   a.pos++;                                                                      \
00147   return tmp;                                                                   \
00148 }                                                                               \
00149                                                                                 \

00152       two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & a)              \
00153 {                                                                               \
00154   a.pos--;                                                                      \
00155   return a;                                                                     \
00156 }                                                                               \

00160       two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & a, int)         \
00161 {                                                                               \
00162   two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> tmp = a;                      \
00163   a.pos--;                                                                              \
00164   return tmp;                                                                           \
00165 }                                                                                       \
00166                                                                                         \
00167 template <unsigned _blk_sz,typename _run_type,class __pos_type>                                         \
00168 inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & operator -= (          \
00169       two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & a,                      \
00170       typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type>::_pos_type n)            \
00171 {                                                                                       \
00172   a.pos-=n;                                                                             \
00173   return a;                                                                             \
00174 }                                                                                       \
00175                                                                                         \
00176 template <unsigned _blk_sz,typename _run_type,class __pos_type>                                         \
00177 inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & operator += (          \
00178       two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & a,                      \
00179       typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type>::_pos_type n)            \
00180 {                                                                                       \
00181   a.pos+=n;                                                                             \
00182   return a;                                                                             \
00183 }                                                                                       \
00184                                                                                         \
00185 template <unsigned _blk_sz,typename _run_type,class __pos_type>                                         \
00186 inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> operator + (             \
00187      const two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & a,                 \
00188      typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type>::_pos_type pos)           \
00189 {                                                                                       \
00190   return two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type>(a.array,a.pos + pos);  \
00191 }                                                                                       \
00192                                                                                         \

00195       typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type>::_pos_type n,            \

00199 }                                                                                       \
00200                                                                                         \
00201 template <unsigned _blk_sz,typename _run_type,class __pos_type>                                         \
00202 inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> operator - (             \
00203       const two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type> & a,                        \
00204       typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type>::_pos_type pos)          \
00205 {                                                                                       \
00206   return two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz,_run_type,__pos_type>(a.array,a.pos - pos);  \
00207 }

00211         template < class one_dim_array_type, class data_type,
00212                 unsigned dim_size, class pos_type =
00213                 int >struct TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor:public
00214                 TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase < one_dim_array_type, data_type,
00215                 pos_type >
00216         {
00217                 typedef TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor < one_dim_array_type,
00218                         data_type, dim_size, pos_type > _Self;
00219 
00220                   TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor (one_dim_array_type * a,
00221                                               pos_type
00222                                               p):TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase <
00223                         one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type > (a, p)
00224                 {
00225                 };
00226                 TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor (const TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor &
00227                                             a):TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase <
00228                         one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type > (a)
00229                 {
00230                 };
00231 
00232                 data_type & operator * ()
00233                 {
00234                         return array[(pos) / dim_size][(pos) % dim_size];
00235                 };
00236 
00237                 data_type *operator -> () const
00238                 {
00239                         return &(array[(pos) / dim_size][(pos) % dim_size]);
00240                 };
00241 
00242                 data_type & operator [](pos_type n)
00243                 {
00244                         n += pos;
00245                         return array[(n) / dim_size][(n) % dim_size];
00246                 };
00247     STXXL_ADAPTOR_ARITHMETICS(pos)
00248         };
00249 
00250         template < class one_dim_array_type, class data_type,
00251                 unsigned dim_size, class pos_type =
00252                 int >struct TwoToOneDimArrayColumnAdaptor:public
00253                 TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase < one_dim_array_type, data_type,
00254                 pos_type >
00255         {
00256                 typedef TwoToOneDimArrayColumnAdaptor < one_dim_array_type,
00257                         data_type, dim_size, pos_type > _Self;
00258 
00259                   TwoToOneDimArrayColumnAdaptor (one_dim_array_type * a,
00260                                                  pos_type
00261                                                  p):TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase
00262                         < one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type > (a, p)
00263                 {
00264                 };
00265                 TwoToOneDimArrayColumnAdaptor (const _Self &
00266                                                a):TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase
00267                         < one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type > (a)
00268                 {
00269                 };
00270 
00271                 data_type & operator * ()
00272                 {
00273                         return array[(pos) % dim_size][(pos) / dim_size];
00274                 };
00275 
00276                 data_type *operator -> () const
00277                 {
00278                         return &(array[(pos) % dim_size][(pos) / dim_size]);
00279                 };
00280 
00281                 const data_type & operator [] (pos_type n) const
00282                 {
00283                         n += pos;
00284                         return array[(n) % dim_size][(n) / dim_size];
00285                 };
00286 
00287                 data_type & operator [](pos_type n)
00288                 {
00289                         n += pos;
00290                         return array[(n) % dim_size][(n) / dim_size];
00291                 };
00292     STXXL_ADAPTOR_ARITHMETICS(pos)

00294         };
